org.openrdf.rio

Interface RDFWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RDFHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryRDFWriter, N3Writer, NQuadsWriter, NTriplesWriter, RDFJSONWriter, RDFWriterBase, RDFXMLPrettyWriter, RDFXMLWriter, TriGWriter, TriXWriter, TurtleWriter

    public interface RDFWriter
extends RDFHandler
    An interface for RDF document writers. To allow RDF document writers to be created through reflection, all implementing classes should define at least two public constructors: one with an OutputStream argument and one with an Writer argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Gets the RDF format that this RDFWriter uses.

      Retrieves the current writer configuration as a single object.
